Author: Blue_Cheese_Olives

Comment: Our southernmost continent is, we’ve been told, the suffocating canary in the global coal mine. The more ice loss in Antarctica, the greater trouble we’re in. So what do we make of a study which found that between 2021 and 2023, there was a record-breaking increase in the Antarctic Ice Sheet?  We mark it down as another in a long line of misses from the global warming zealots.  Climate change is mostly from the imagination of people who would financially benefit from this clap trap nonsense!  Including dictators and leaders of countries.
